plot: Four villains seek to wrest from a mute girl the secret location of a prehistoric gold statuette discovered by her father. Her silence dates from the day when she saw her father murdered for that same statue.   Written by  Anonymous
title: El secreto del peñatu
plot_es: Four villains seek to wrest from a mute girl the secret location of a prehistoric gold statuette discovered by her father. Her silence dates from the day when she saw her father murdered for that same statue.   Written by  Anonymous
plot_en: Four villains seek to wrest from a mute girl the secret location of a prehistoric gold statuette discovered by her father. Her silence dates from the day when she saw her father murdered for that same statue.   Written by  Anonymous
